articles.author: Sam Hill
articles.title: What Jurgen Klopp said to Mikel Arteta at full-time speaks volumes of Arsenal title chances - Football.London
articles.description: Arsenal maintained their place at the top of the Premier League table heading into Christmas following a crucial 1-1 draw against Liverpool
articles.content: Jurgen Klopp's comments to Mikel Arteta at full-time spoke volumes of Arsenal's chances of winning a first Premier League title since 2004. The Gunners picked up a crucial point against Liverpool aft… [+2314 chars]
